92.eng-name: Afflictions and the End of the World

hadiths.text: Abu Sa`id Al-Khudri added that the Prophet (ﷺ) further said:"I will say those people are from me. It will be said, 'You do not know what changes and new things they did after you.' Then I will say, 'Far removed (from mercy), far removed (from mercy), those who changed (the religion) after me

chapter.ara-name: بَابُ مَا جَاءَ فِي قَوْلِ اللَّهِ تَعَالَى: {وَاتَّقُوا فِتْنَةً لاَ تُصِيبَنَّ الَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا مِنْكُمْ خَاصَّةً}
chapter.eng-name: “And fear the Fitnah which affects not in particular those among you who do wrong….”
